            2024年值得推荐的6款Vue后台管理系统模板，开源且免费！

                    阅读2分钟
                  </span> <!----></div></div> <div style="flex:1;" data-v-7cdd11fb=""></div> <!----> <!----></div> <!----> <!----> <!----> <div id="article-root" itemprop="articleBody" class="main" data-v-7cdd11fb=""><div class="article-viewer markdown-body result"><h2 data-id="heading-0">前言</h2>
<p>在现今的软件开发领域，<code>Vue.js</code>凭借其高效、灵活和易于上手的特性，成为了前端开发的热门选择。对于需要快速搭建企业级后台管理系统的开发者而言，使用现成的Vue后台管理系统模板无疑是一个明智之举。本文大姚将为你推荐6款开源、免费(基于MIT License开源协议)、开箱即用的Vue后台管理系统模板，帮助你快速启动项目，专注于业务逻辑的开发。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">适合后端程序员的前端框架</h2>
<p>收录一些开箱即用、使用简单、界面美观、功能强大的前端框架，帮助我们后端程序员快速提高学习、工作开发效率（<strong>注意：排名不分先后，都是十分优秀的开源前端框架和项目💖</strong>）。</p>
<ul>
<li>收录地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FYSGStudyHards%2FDotNetGuide%2Fissues%2F12" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/issues/12" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/YSGStudyHar…</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/8adaa983bce7445fbf5f350978d5a978~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=x4kji6s661Okj%2FPrl1kle6U9s0c%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/fdae72c8f5fe4bd887fc9d8ce6c3a38f~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=SdlwHYb4A8zoEpIDbuhL6wW6n%2Bg%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">vue-element-admin</h2>
<p>vue-element-admin是一个后台前端解决方案，它基于 vue 和 element-ui实现。它使用了最新的前端技术栈，内置了 i18n 国际化解决方案，动态路由，权限验证，提炼了典型的业务模型，提供了丰富的功能组件，它可以帮助你快速搭建企业级中后台产品原型。相信不管你的需求是什么，本项目都能帮助到你。</p>
<ul>
<li>开源地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FPanJiaChen%2Fvue-element-admin" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/PanJiaChen/vue-element-admin" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/PanJiaChen/…</a></li>
<li>在线预览：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fpanjiachen.github.io%2Fvue-element-admin" target="_blank" title="https://panjiachen.github.io/vue-element-admin" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">panjiachen.github.io/vue-element…</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/962f17d358234efb904277dc37696626~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=8jYE%2FDJIBZdWiEtSW%2FSyyTBjIYs%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/210b70a0e63446a78fec15382472f287~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=oGjZMvmr7USeWh36kkDOV1IDDdk%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/ec6a3d8d68c145e898b12aaf6cd01e66~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=YZxjY9e2KW1oxj4GbvppbLih41k%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">Naive Ui Admin</h2>
<p>Naive Ui Admin 是一款 完全免费 且可商用的中后台解决方案，基于 Vue3.0 、Vite 、 Naive UI 和 TypeScript 。 它融合了最新的前端技术栈，提炼了典型的业务模型和页面，包括二次封装组件、动态菜单、权限校验等功能，助力快速搭建企业级中后台项目。</p>
<ul>
<li>开源地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fjekip%2Fnaive-ui-admin" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/jekip/naive-ui-admin" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/jekip/naive…</a></li>
<li>在线预览：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fnaive-ui-admin.vercel.app" target="_blank" title="https://naive-ui-admin.vercel.app" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">naive-ui-admin.vercel.app</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/512b54582f154e28baa6c1194b3ae467~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=viJp66CgeyeGtS4VQuW%2FeEgIMOM%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/2442f694cfd644b8962113b84aec9bf8~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=kpiB2ym7IxeOhzqnfYWVvStcoo0%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/0c961a722fdc401785a2318461ee1b16~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=79xOJY5ch7ND1cF03kEZii03XXo%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">Ant Design Vue Pro</h2>
<p>这里是 Ant Design 的 Vue 实现，开发和服务于企业级后台产品。基于Vue框架集成的一个开箱即用的中台前端/设计解决方案。</p>
<ul>
<li>开源地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FvueComponent%2Fant-design-vue-pro" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/vueComponent/ant-design-vue-pro" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/vueComponen…</a></li>
<li>在线预览：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fpreview.pro.antdv.com%2Fuser%2Flogin" target="_blank" title="https://preview.pro.antdv.com/user/login" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">preview.pro.antdv.com/user/login</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/e581db5916014508a95aa5643d3a9616~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=OIB%2FUMFEhxjhsZt7bme9W%2FC%2FZ4w%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/9fa70b1898f8483da9d4001e972b936e~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=uzVegJGCUgPxmV55mNLYSsHjdvM%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2 data-id="heading-5">Arco Design Pro Vue</h2>
<p>基于 Arco Design Vue组件库的开箱即用的中后台前端解决方案。Admin 中后台管理页面，创新的多架构方案。</p>
<ul>
<li>开源地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Farco-design%2Farco-design-pro-vue" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/arco-design/arco-design-pro-vue" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/arco-design…</a></li>
<li>在线预览：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fvue-pro.arco.design%2Flogin" target="_blank" title="https://vue-pro.arco.design/login" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">vue-pro.arco.design/login</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/cd765b8319594b3cb0c797f0b7e32338~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=5KljDLxPA7H%2BR4hkegUbY4oARmk%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2 data-id="heading-6">vue-pure-admin</h2>
<p>vue-pure-admin 是一款开源免费且开箱即用的中后台管理系统模版。完全采用 ECMAScript 模块（ESM）规范来编写和组织代码，使用了最新的 Vue3、 Vite、Element-Plus、TypeScript、Pinia、Tailwindcss 等主流技术开发。</p>
<ul>
<li>开源地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fpure-admin%2Fvue-pure-admin" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/pure-admin/vue-pure-admin" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/pure-admin/…</a></li>
<li>在线预览：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fpure-admin.github.io%2Fvue-pure-admin" target="_blank" title="https://pure-admin.github.io/vue-pure-admin" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">pure-admin.github.io/vue-pure-ad…</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/b43dc835f75e4d87ade8e87653e40d00~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6L-96YCQ5pe25YWJ6ICF:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1740941579&amp;x-signature=gz7nzcJWEN9hW08ArgrhJo9BaXs%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2 data-id="heading-7">TDesign Vue Next Starter</h2>
<p>TDesign Vue Next Starter 是一个基于 TDesign，使用 Vue3、Vite、Pinia、TypeScript 开发，可进行个性化主题配置，旨在提供项目开箱即用的、配置式的中后台项目。</p>
<ul>
<li>开源地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FTencent%2Ftdesign-vue-next-starter" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/Tencent/tdesign-vue-next-starter" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/Tencent/tde…</a></li>
<li>在线预览：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Ftdesign.tencent.com%2Fstarter%2Fvue-next%2Flogin" target="_blank" title="https://tdesign.tencent.com/starter/vue-next/login" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">tdesign.tencent.com/starter/vue…</a></li>
</ul>
